cast.overview: In this classic story of love and devotion set against the backdrop of the American Civil War, a wounded Confederate soldier named W.P. Inman deserts his unit and travels across the South, aiming to return to his young wife, Ada, who he left behind to tend their farm. As Inman makes his perilous journey home, Ada struggles to keep their home intact with the assistance of Ruby, a mysterious drifter sent to help her by a kindly neighbor.
cast.title: Cold Mountain

cast.overview: A young reformed gambler must return to playing big stakes poker to help a friend pay off loan sharks.
cast.title: Rounders

cast.original_title: The Assassination of Jesse James by the Coward Robert Ford
cast.overview: Outlaw Jesse James is rumored to be the 'fastest gun in the West'. An eager recruit into James' notorious gang, Robert Ford eventually grows jealous of the famed outlaw and, when Robert and his brother sense an opportunity to kill James, their murderous action elevates their target to near mythical status.
cast.title: The Assassination of Jesse James by the Coward Robert Ford

details.biography:
​From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

Tom Aldredge (born February 28, 1928) is an American actor. He has achieved notice on television, in films and in theatre.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Tom Aldredge, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Tom Aldredge
